data.name: ReadCashReceiptDetailStatus
data.value: select top(1) CRDETAIL_STAT_ID from CKT_CR_DETAIL_STAT where CRDETAIL_STAT_ID = @crdetailStatId

data.name: ReadCashReceiptSourceType
data.value: select top(1) CR_SRCE_TYPE_ID, CODE, EFFECTIVE_DATE, DISCONTINUE_DATE, COURT_IND from CKT_CRSRC_TYPE where (CODE = 'MISC') and (EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @effectiveDate) and (DISCONTINUE_DATE > @effectiveDate)

data.name: ReadCashReceiptStatus
data.value: select top(1) CR_STATUS_ID, CODE from CKT_CR_STATUS where CR_STATUS_ID = @crStatusId

data.name: ReadCashReceiptType
data.value: select top(1) CRTYPE_ID, CODE, CATEGORY_IND, EFFECTIVE_DATE, DISCONTINUE_DATE from CKT_CR_TYPE where (CODE = 'RECAP') and (EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @effectiveDate) and (DISCONTINUE_DATE > @effectiveDate)

data.name: ReadCollectionType
data.value: select top(1) COLLECTION_TYPE_ID, CODE from CKT_COLLTN_TYPE where CODE = 'R'
